trans-unit.source:
These questions ask you about how you feel at school and some of the things you do at school. There are no right or wrong answers. Choose the answer that best describes what you think. No, never; Yes, some of the time; Yes, most of the time; Yes, all of the time.

The first two are for practice.
trans-unit.target:
This pesewa ask how you dey feel for school and some things you dey do for school. No correct or wrong answers dey. Choose the answer wey fit what you dey think. No, never; Yes, some of the time; Yes, most of the time; Yes, all of the time.

The first two be practice.

trans-unit.source: Do you like to read cartoon books?
trans-unit.target: Do you like to read comic books?

trans-unit.source: Are you neat and tidy at school?
trans-unit.target: Are you neat and tidy at school?

trans-unit.source: Is your teacher nice to you?
trans-unit.target: Is your teacher nice to you?

trans-unit.source: Does your teacher listen to you?
trans-unit.target: Does your teacher listen to you?

trans-unit.source: Do you feel safe at school?
trans-unit.target: Do you feel safe at school?

trans-unit.source: Do you have friends in your class?
trans-unit.target: Do you have friends in your class?

trans-unit.source: Do the kids in your class help you when you need it?
trans-unit.target: Do the kids in your class help you when you need it?

trans-unit.source: Do the kids in your class play with you?
trans-unit.target: Do the kids in your class play with you?

trans-unit.source: Are the kids in your class nice to you?
trans-unit.target: Are the kids in your class nice to you?

trans-unit.source: Do you feel lonely at school?
trans-unit.target: Do you feel lonely at school?

trans-unit.source: Are you good at learning things in school?
trans-unit.target: Are you good at learning things in school?

trans-unit.source: When schoolwork is hard, do you give up right away?
trans-unit.target: When schoolwork is hard, do you give up right away?

trans-unit.source: Do you enjoy doing reading activities at school?
trans-unit.target: Do you enjoy doing reading activities at school?

trans-unit.source: Do you enjoy doing math activities at school?
trans-unit.target: Do you enjoy doing math activities at school?

trans-unit.source: Some kids think they can get smarter if they work really hard. Do you think that you can get smarter if you work really hard?
trans-unit.target: Some kids think they can get smarter if they work really hard. Do you think that you can get smarter if you work really hard?

trans-unit.source: Some kids think they can get better at reading if they work really hard. Do you think that you can get better at reading if you work really hard?
trans-unit.target: Some kids think they can get better at reading if they work really hard. Do you think that you can get better at reading if you work really hard?

trans-unit.source: Some kids think they can get better at math if they work really hard. Do you think that you can get better at math if you work really hard?
trans-unit.target: Some kids think they can get better at math if they work really hard. Do you think that you can get better at math if you work really hard?
